questions.question: Ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije mu butumwa ntibishobora gutonda uburebure burenga umurongo wa m 500. Iyi bibaye bityo ibinyabiziga
options: b) ibinyabiziga by’abasirikare biherekeranyije mu nsisiro

questions.question: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabizaga uri kugendera mu muhanda w’ibyerekezo bibiri nuruhe ruhande rw’umuhanda agomba gukoresha ?

b) Mu gice cy;umuhanda yumva ashaka
c) Mu gice cy’iburyo bw’umuhanda uretse igihe ashaka kunyuranaho cyangwa gukata ibumoso
questions.answer: c) Mu gice cy’iburyo bw’umuhanda uretse igihe ashaka kunyuranaho cyangwa gukata ibumoso

questions.answer: b) iyo ikinyabiziga kigiye kubisikana nikindi

Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
options: a) Umuyobozi abujijwe kurenga umurongo wera ucagaguye cyeretse mugihe bitateza icyago
c) Biremewe kunyuranaho ariko nturenge umurongo wera ucagaguye
questions.answer: a) Umuyobozi abujijwe kurenga umurongo wera ucagaguye cyeretse mugihe bitateza icyago

options: a) Guhagarara hanyuma ukagenda gake    gake witonze kugezaho ureba neza.
b) Kwihuta wegera imbere aho ushobora kureba ugafunga ikindi cyerekezo.
c) Gutegereza abanyamaguru bakakumenyesha ko ntakibazo wakata.
d) Guhindukiza imodoka vuba kugirango ushake indi nzira wakoresha.
questions.answer: a) Guhagarara hanyuma ukagenda gake    gake witonze kugezaho ureba neza.

Uretse mu mijyi, kuyindi mihanda yagenywe na minisiteri ushinzwe gutwara ibintu n’abantu, uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite imitambiko itatu ni:
Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga yakara iki mu gihe anyuzweho nikindi kinyabiziga?
Mu bimenyetso bimurika itara ritukura rivuga iki ?
options: a) Hagarara kereste niba ushaka gukata ibumoso
b) Hagarara niba ubona ntabyago byaguteza
d) Wemerewe kugenda niba aho asohokera mu masangano y’umuhanda hafunze

questions.question: Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko umuvuduko ntarengwa w’amapikipiki mu isaha ni:
Niki wakora igihe utabona neza usubira inyuma ?
options: a) Kumanura ikirahure cy’imodoka urebe inyuma
b) Gufungura umuryango w’imodoka ureba inyuma
c) Gushaka umuntu uri hanze y’ikinyabiziga ukuyobora
questions.answer: c) Gushaka umuntu uri hanze y’ikinyabiziga ukuyobora

questions.question: Ni ikihe cyapa muri ibi kintegeka gutanga inzira:
Mu gihe utwaye ikinyabiziga ni joro ucanye amatara maremare ugahura n’ikindi kinyabiziga giturutse mu kindi cyerecyezo:
options: b) Kuzimya ucana amatara maremare n’amagufi
c) Kuzimya amatara maremare kugeza ikindi kinyabiziga gitambutse
questions.answer: c) Kuzimya amatara maremare kugeza ikindi kinyabiziga gitambutse

questions.question: Umubare w’abagenzi bemewe gutwarwa mukinyabiziga wanditswe mu :
Muri ibi byapa bikurikira ni ikihe cyerekana ko umuyobozi ukibonye yemerewe gutambuka mbere y'abaturutse aho agana mu nzira ifunganye:
Kuki abanyamaguru batemerewe kwambuka umuhanda mw’ikoni cyangwa hafi y’imodoka ihagaze?
options: c) Abandi bayobozi bi binyabiziga baza bashobora kutabona abambuka umuhanda
questions.answer: c) Abandi bayobozi bi binyabiziga baza bashobora kutabona abambuka umuhanda
